entries.title: Twitter Promised Them Severance. They Got Nothing
entries.description: Staff laid off by Elon Musk were assured they would be compensated following mass cuts. As the deadline passes, the silence has been deafening.

entries.title: No One Will Escape the FTX Fallout
entries.description: Try as they might, crypto companies pressured by the trading platform’s collapse are failing to bail themselves out.

entries.title: Welcome to the Wet Hot AI Chatbot Summer
entries.description: The next big thing in tech isn’t the blockchain or the metaverse—it’s a mind-bending wave of algorithmic content machines.

entries.title: Does Meta’s Horizon Workrooms Deliver? Customers Say Yes … and No
entries.description: Companies trialing the metaverse space say it’s kind of fun, but only in small doses.
